title: WHIRLING / BATHTUB
description: You can take a bath and wash that corpse stench off.

dialogueTree.title: Bathtub: "This is not the cleanest bathtub in..."
dialogueTree.english: This is not the cleanest bathtub in the world, but it's cleaner than you are right now.
dialogueTree.polish: Nie jest to najczystsza wanna na świecie, ale na pewno czystsza niż ty teraz.
dialogueTree.belarusian: Гэта не самае чыстае джакузі ў свеце, але напэўна чысцейшае, чым ты зараз.

links.title: Perception (Smell): "Ah, that soap scum smell. It smells..."
links.english: Ah, that soap scum smell. It smells like life. At least compared to you.
links.polish: Ach, ten zapach mydła wapniowego. Przypomina życie. W każdym razie bardziej niż twój odór.
links.belarusian: Ах, гэты пах вапновага мыла. Нагадвае пра жыццё. Ва ўсякім разе больш, чым твой пах.

links.title: You: "Run yourself a bath."
links.english: Run yourself a bath.
links.polish: Urządź sobie kąpiel.
links.belarusian: Уладкуй сабе ванну.

links.title: Bathtub: "The bathtub slowly fills with water..."
links.english: The bathtub slowly fills with water. The water beckons.
links.polish: Wanna powoli napełnia się wodą. Kusi cię.
links.belarusian: Ванна павольна напаўняецца вадой. Спакушае цябе.

links.title: You: "Undress, close your eyes, and subme..."
links.english: Undress, close your eyes, and submerge.
links.polish: Rozbierz się, zamknij oczy i się zanurz.
links.belarusian: Раздрадзься, заплюшчы вочы і акуніся.

links.title: Bathtub: "The water doesn't feel particularly..."
links.english: The water doesn't feel particularly clean. A few beer cans are bobbing up and down along your flanks like sad duckies. You pause to think before letting your head go under.
links.polish: Woda nie wydaje się szczególnie czysta. Obok ciebie, niczym smutne kaczuszki, kołysze się kilka puszek po piwie. Chwilę się zastanawiasz, po czym pozwalasz swojej głowie się zanurzyć.
links.belarusian: Вада не выглядае асабліва чыстай. Побач з табой, як сумныя качачкі, пагойдваюцца некалькі бляшанак з-пад піва. Хвіліну задумваешся, пасля чаго дазваляеш сваёй галаве апусціцца ў ваду.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Hold it right there! Keep your head..."
links.english: Hold it right there! Keep your head above water, or you'll lose all those pheromones Morell sprayed on you.
links.polish: Chwila, opanuj się! Trzymaj głowę nad wodą, bo wszystkie te feromony, którymi spryskał cię Morell, przepadną.
links.belarusian: Хвіліна, супакойся! Трымай галаву над вадой, бо ўсе гэтыя ферамоны, якімі апырскаў цябе Морэл, знікнуць.

links.title: You: "I don't care. I just want to be eng..."
links.english: I don't care. I just want to be engulfed.
links.polish: Nie obchodzi mnie to. Chcę, żeby spowiła mnie woda.
links.belarusian: Мяне гэта не хвалюе. Я хачу, каб вада ахінула мяне.

links.title: Bathtub: "The lukewarm water is comforting, l..."
links.english: The lukewarm water is comforting, like amniotic fluid.
links.polish: Letnia woda przynosi ukojenie niczym płyn owodniowy.
links.belarusian: Летняя вада прыносіць супакаенне, як амниотычная вадкасць.

links.title: You: "Keep your head above water, just in..."
links.english: Keep your head above water, just in case.
links.polish: Na wszelki wypadek trzymaj głowę nad wodą.
links.belarusian: На ўсякі выпадак трымай галаву над вадой.

links.title: Bathtub: "The water is only lukewarm, but sti..."
links.english: The water is only lukewarm, but still comforting, like amniotic fluid. A few beer cans are bobbing up and down along your flanks like sad duckies.
links.polish: Woda jest ledwie ciepła, ale i tak przynosi ukojenie niczym płyn owodniowy. Obok ciebie, jak smutne kaczuszki, kołysze się kilka puszek po piwie.
links.belarusian: Вада ледзь цёплая, але ўсё ж прыносіць супакаенне, як амниотычная вадкасць. Побач з табой, як сумныя качаняты, хістаюцца некалькі слоікаў з-пад піва.

links.title: Inland Empire: "You feel nice and lonely. And so, s..."
links.english: You feel nice and lonely. And so, so tired.
links.polish: Czujesz się miło i samotnie. I jesteś bardzo, bardzo zmęczony.
links.belarusian: Ты адчуваеш сябе прыемна і самотна. І ты вельмі, вельмі стомлены.

links.title: You: "Take the beer cans out."
links.english: Take the beer cans out.
links.polish: Wystaw puszki poza wannę.
links.belarusian: Выставіце бляшанкі за ванну.

links.title: Bathtub: "Now you are alone with your thought..."
links.english: Now you are alone with your thoughts in the tub. But it's easier than being alone with your thoughts outside the tub.
links.polish: Jesteś teraz w wannie sam na sam ze swoimi myślami. Ale to łatwiejsze, niż bycie z nimi sam na sam poza wanną.
links.belarusian: Вы цяпер у ванне сам-на-сам са сваімі думкамі. Але гэта лягчэй, чым быць з імі сам-на-сам па-за ваннай.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "They're not even really thoughts. J..."
links.english: They're not even really thoughts. Just assorted sensations, none of them acute enough to focus on.
links.polish: To tak naprawdę nie są nawet myśli. Po prostu różne odczucia, z których żadne nie jest na tyle jasne, żeby się na nim skupić.
links.belarusian: Гэта насамрэч нават не думкі. Проста розныя адчуванні, з якіх ніводнае не настолькі яснае, каб на ім засяродзіцца.

links.title: You: "Linger in the tub a little."
links.english: Linger in the tub a little.
links.polish: Posiedź w wannie chwilę dłużej.
links.belarusian: Пасядзі ў ванне крыху даўжэй.

links.title: Bathtub: "Your fingers grow pale and are cove..."
links.english: Your fingers grow pale and are covered with tiny whorls as the water cools.
links.polish: W miarę jak woda stygnie, twoje palce robią się blade i pomarszczone.
links.belarusian: Па меры таго, як вада астывае, твае пальцы робяцца бледнымі і маршчыністымі.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "What are you doing? You're not some..."
links.english: What are you doing? You're not some fat fish in a fucking aquarium. Time to get moving.
links.polish: Co ty wyprawiasz? Nie jesteś jakąś jebaną rybą w zasranym akwarium. Czas się ruszyć.
links.belarusian: Што ты робіш? Ты ж не нейкая халера рыба ў засраным акварыуме. Час рушыць.

links.title: You: "Imagine something."
links.english: Imagine something.
links.polish: Wyobraź sobie coś.
links.belarusian: Уяві сабе нешта.

links.title: Bathtub: "You see the corpse. You can still s..."
links.english: You see the corpse. You can still smell the cadaver on you. It's going to take more than one bath to get rid of that stench.
links.polish: Widzisz ciało. Wciąż czujesz na sobie trupi zapach. Jedna kąpiel to za mało, żeby usunąć taki odór.
links.belarusian: Ты бачыш цела. Да гэтага часу адчуваеш на сябе трупны пах. Адной ванны занадта мала, каб выдаліць такі смурод.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Then -- houses along a narrow stree..."
links.english: Then -- houses along a narrow street. A video rental. Darkness on the planet's curvature.
links.polish: A potem... Domy wzdłuż wąskiej ulicy. Wypożyczalnia wideo. Mrok na krzywiźnie planety.
links.belarusian: А потым... Дамы ўздоўж вузкай вуліцы. Пракат відэа. Цемра на крывізне планеты.

links.title: You: "Get out. (Conclude.)"
links.english: Get out. (Conclude.)
links.polish: Wyjdź. (Zakończ).
links.belarusian: Выйдзі. (Скончыць).

links.title: Bathtub: "The water line recedes as you stand..."
links.english: The water line recedes as you stand. You are cold now. Your clothes stick to your still moist skin.
links.polish: Linia wody opada, kiedy wstajesz. Jest ci teraz zimno. Ubranie przykleja się do twojej wciąż wilgotnej skóry.
links.belarusian: Лінія вады апускаецца, калі ты падымаешся. Ты цяпер адчуваеш холад. Адзенне прыляпляецца да тваёй усё яшчэ вільготнай скуры.

links.title: You: "Leave the beer cans in."
links.english: Leave the beer cans in.
links.polish: Zostaw puszki w wannie.
links.belarusian: Пакінь бляшанкі ў ванне.

links.title: Bathtub: "The cans continue to bob, as do you..."
links.english: The cans continue to bob, as do your thoughts, aimlessly splashing up against the sides of the tub.
links.polish: Puszki, jak twoje myśli, dalej się kołyszą, stukając czasem o ścianki wanny.
links.belarusian: Бляшанкі, як твае думкі, далей пагойдваюцца, стукаючы часам аб сценкі ванны.

links.title: You: "I want to live forever with the cor..."
links.english: I want to live forever with the corpse smell. Memento mori and stuff. [Leave.]
links.polish: Chcę spędzić resztę życia z aromatem trupa. Memento mori i w ogóle. [Odejdź].
links.belarusian: Я хачу правесці астатак свайго жыцця з водарам трупа. Memento mori і ўсё такое. [Сыдзі].
